function.description:
Saves the `content` to a file specified by `uri`.
It returns the absolute path of the affected file if the file was created, otherwise false. If the file already exists, it's always overwritten.
*Remark:* The `content` can be of any variable type. This function always gets string value of provided variable as a content that is saved into the file.
